TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit TableLayoutStyleCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
Public MustInherit Class TableLayoutStyleCollection Implements IList
public ref class TableLayoutStyleCollection abstract : System::Collections::IList

summary.span: 實作資料表配置樣式集合的基本功能。

span.span: Implements the basic functionality for a collection of table layout styles.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別代表用來描述資料行或資料列中相關聯的所有樣式集合。The class represents the collection of all the styles used to describe the columns or rows in an associated . 類別衍生自特製化，如下所示：Classes derived from are specialized as follows: - A做為集合會彙總資料行樣式物件。A aggregates column styles as a collection of objects. - A做為集合的彙總資料列的樣式物件。A aggregates row styles as a collection of objects. 大部分的成員方式實作。Most of the members of are implementations of .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32 Add(class System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle style) cil managed
Public Function Add (style As TableLayoutStyle) As Integer

span.span: The to add to the .

summary.span: 將新的 加入至目前集合的結尾。

span.span: Adds a new to the end of the current collection.
The position into which the new element was inserted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法重新套用至控制項中目前的資料表配置容器。The method reapplies the table layout to all the controls in the current container. 儲存在集合中的樣式數目只會受到可用記憶體。The number of styles stored in a collection is limited only by available memory.

exception.span: 已指派給另一位擁有人。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Clear() cil managed

summary.span: 解除集合與其關聯的 之間的關聯性，然後清空此集合。

span.span: Disassociates the collection from its associated and empties the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 無法覆寫這個方法。This method cannot be overridden. 方法會執行兩個主要動作：The method performs two main actions: - 它會解除關聯目前從其容器以便樣式是不再套用至面板中所包含之控制項的版面配置。It disassociates the current from its container so that the styles are no longer applied to the layout of the controls contained within the panel. 如此一來，重新套用資料表配置面板中的所有控制項。As a result, the table layout is reapplied to all the controls in the panel. - 它會清空所有的集合及其物件。It empties the collection of all of its objects. 如此一來，屬性設定為 0。As a result, the property is set to 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有其中一個衍生型別，或，可以儲存在。Only one of the derived types, or , can be stored in a . 樣式的執行個體可以是只與單一容器相關聯。An instance of a style can be associated only with a single container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 無法覆寫這個方法。This method cannot be overridden. 之前已移除，它會解除關聯其容器。Before the is removed, it is disassociated from its container. 如此一來，重新套用資料表配置面板中的所有控制項。As a result, the table layout is reapplied to all the controls in the panel.
